title: Xiaomi launches its premium flagship, the Xiaomi 12 Pro in India
content:
Xiaomi has become synonymous with a brand that makes value products. No matter what product you pick up that has a Xiaomi branding on it, you are bound to get one of the best value-for-money propositions. People confuse this proposition and brand Xiaomi products as “budget” devices, which is far from the truth on devices

The post Xiaomi launches its premium flagship, the Xiaomi 12 Pro in India appeared first on XDA.
description: Xiaomi has launched the Xiaomi 12 Pro in India, its premium flagship for 2022. Read on to know more about its pricing and availability!
